name: Shinobi_EMP
description:
Dodge the bullets that the Robots shoot at you with the arrow keys or WASD! As a shinobi, stealth is your main weapon - in addition to your EMP. You can use "J" to shut down those pesky Robots. However, they aren't affected for long. But maybe the effect lasts long enough to use their weapons against themselves.

But be careful - using the EMP is exhausting, and your Ninja will also have to catch his breath.

Controls:

  • Move: WASD/Arrow Keys
  • Stop Time: J

Cocreation of Team GameChangers: https://ealdwulf.itch.io/ and https://misrath.itch.io/

"Kill all Ninjas" and Laser Sounds created by Tobaay, used with permission: https://github.com/Tobaay/Catalysts-Game-Jam-Sound-Effects/tree/master
